snippet: Video recorded this week during the arrest of gay rights activists in Moscow shows what Russia’s legal ban on “propaganda for nontraditional sexual relationships” looks like in practice.
abstract: Video recorded this week during the arrest of gay rights activists in Moscow shows what Russia’s legal ban on “propaganda for nontraditional sexual relationships” looks like in practice.

byline.original: By ROBERT MACKEY and ANDREW ROTH

headline.main: Video Offers Glimpse of Russia's Ban on Gay 'Propaganda' in Action on a Moscow Street
